abstracts.abstract: Private School Facilities;  Provides that certain private schools are considered permitted use in all zoning districts; requires certain private schools to conduct traffic study before being considered permitted use in such districts; authorizes certain private schools to operate in facilities that meet specified requirements; requires certain private schools operating in specified facilities to meet specified requirements relating to Florida Building Code & Florida Fire Prevention Code; requires certain private schools to have automatic sprinkler systems; provides exception to such requirements.
